name: 蕭耀榮
objective:
先修課程:4403053或負責教授同意
本徵值與本徵函數，向量分析，向量微積分，傅立葉級數與邊界值問題，偏微分方程，複變函數。
schedule:
Chapter 9 Vector Differential Calculus. Grad, Div, Curl(3 weeks)
9.1 Vectors in 2-Space and 3-Space
9.2 Inner Product
9.3 Vector Product
9.4 Vector and Scalar Functions and Their Fields
9.5 Curves. Arc Length. Curvature. Torsion
9.7 Gradient of a Scalar Field.
9.8 Divergence of a Vector Field
9.9 Curl of a Vector Field

Chapter 10 Vector Integral Calculus(4 weeks)
10.1 Line Integrals 
10.2 Path Independence of Line Integrals 
10.4 Green’s Theorem in the Plane
10.5 Surfaces for Surface Integrals
10.6 Surface Integrals
10.7 Divergence Theorem of Gauss
10.9 Stokes’s Theorem

Chapter 11 Fourier Analysis(3 weeks)
11.1 Fourier Series
11.2 Half-Range Expansions
11.5 Sturm-Liouville Problems
11.6 Orthogonal Series
11.7 Fourier Integral
11.8 Fourier Cosine and Sine Transforms
11.9 Fourier Transform

Chapter 12 Partial Differential Equations (4 weeks)
12.2 Modeling: Vibration String. Wave Equation
12.3 Solution by Separating Variables.
12.5 Modeling: Heat Flow from a Body in Space. Heat Equation
12.6 Heat Equation: Solution by Fourier Series. Steady Heat Problems.
12.7 Heat Equation of Very Long Bars: Solution by Fourier Integrals and Transforms
12.8 Two-Dimensional Wave Equation
12.9 Rectangular Membrane. Double Fourier Series
12.10 Laplacian in Polar Coordinates. Circular Membrane. Fourier-Bessel Series
12.11 Laplace’s Equation in Cylindrical and Spherical Coordinates. Potential
12.12 Solution of ODEs by Laplace Transforms
